ygData.subject: Need advice for an off-hand weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: Currently I m a 45 bard using an Ebon Razor (9/25, +4 MR/FR/CR) in my primary slot (coz its primary hand only) and a Journeyman s Walking Stick (9/24, +4
ygData.messageBody:
Currently I'm a 45 bard using an Ebon Razor (9/25, +4 MR/FR/CR) in my
primary slot (coz its primary hand only) and a Journeyman's Walking Stick
(9/24, +4 STR/WIS/INT procs Tashani) in my off hand. I would like to find
an off hand weapon better than the Ebon Razor so I can switch the JWS over
to primary hand (that proc is sweet for bards). I suppose I could buy a
SSOY but before I fork out the cash for one of those was wondering if there
was something better I could get for around 2K plat.

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
